summary: Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience building end-to-end web applications using Go, React, and TypeScript. Strong background in backend APIs, frontend state management, authentication, and containerized deployments. Experienced in delivering production-ready features across the full development lifecycle.

experience.role: Software Engineering Intern - Full-Stack Developer (Go & React)
responsibilities: Developed full-stack features for myESI, a multi-tenant application security platform.
Built backend services in Go and Python for SBOM ingestion, vulnerability scanning, and risk analysis.
Designed and implemented REST APIs with JWT-based authentication and organization-RBAC.
Developed React + TypeScript frontend components to visualize scan results, risk scores, and system data.
Optimized concurrent processing and Redis caching to improve system responsiveness.
Implemented asynchronous workflows using Kafka, scheduled workers, and Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Maintained Linux-based deployments using Docker, Nginx, and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.company: Can Tho Radio & Television Station - THTPCT
responsibilities: Built a role-based content management system with approval workflows.
Developed backend services and REST APIs using Java Spring Boot.
Implemented frontend components using React, HTML, and CSS.
Integrated MySQL and Firestore for data storage.
Collaborated with team members to deliver internal web applications.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and built a personal portfolio website showcasing projects, code samples, and contact information.

projects.name: E-commerce website - Go
details: Integrated AI-assisted ordering via a Vertex AI chatbot (function calling), and intelligent product search using voice and image recognition (TensorFlow).
Supported multiple payment methods (COD, VNPAY, PayPal).
Implemented AI-based review moderation (toxic/NSFW filtering) and sentiment analysis.
Applied role-based access control and secure user authentication.
projects.status: About to be deployed on Linux using Docker and GitHub Actions CI/CD, with backend on AWS EC2 and PostgreSQL on AWS RDS.
